Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2009...
Injured on 7/5/2009 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Traded from Cleveland to Pittsburgh on 1/31/2012 (Going to CLE: P L. Lynn, RF N. Schierholz. Going to PIT: 2B J. Kipnis, P C. Reitsma)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/2012, off Kelvim Escobar (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/12/2012, off Tony Armas Jr. (MIL)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/5/2013...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/14/2017 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/30/2018 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 4/20/2021 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/1/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
